programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: After a prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one.

programme.title: Grizzly
programme.desc: An 18-foot killer grizzly terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a park ranger to stop the slaughter.

programme.title: Nightbreed
programme.desc: Boone may be a troubled young man, but his troubles are just beginning.

programme.title: Phantasm: Remastered
programme.desc: The residents of a small town have begun dying under strange circumstances, leading young Mike to investigate.

programme.title: Phantasm 3: Lord of the Dead
programme.desc: Mike and Reggie continue to hunt the mysterious Tall Man, discovering that the invasion has already begun.

programme.title: Phantasm 4: Oblivion
programme.desc: Mike again escapes from the Tall Man and travels through time to learn more about his nemesis.

programme.title: Phantasm 5: Ravager
programme.desc: Reggie wanders through the desert, but suddenly awakes in a different dimension.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.desc: When a small Colombian village is viciously attacked by a creature from a nearby lake, a corrupt chemical company sends a specialist.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: A biological experiment goes haywire when meat-eating mutant roaches invade an island community.

programme.title: Amityville: The Evil Escapes
programme.desc: The demonic forces that were lurking in Amityville escape to California by inhabiting a lamp.

programme.title: Dog Soldiers
programme.desc: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.

programme.title: Alligator
programme.desc: A flushed baby alligator survives on hormone-filled lab rats, grows giant, and unleashes chaos in Chicago.
